SELECT message_inf.id as id, author, content, create_time FROM message_inf, user_inf WHERE user_inf.type = 2 AND author = nickname
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message_inf ( type, author, content, create_time, repost_times, comment_times, support_times ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{author}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE message_inf SET repost_times = repost_times + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE message_inf SET support_times = support_times + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE message_inf SET comment_times = comment_times + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
